SEARCH
Package javazoom.jl.player

Class jlp

java.lang.Object
javazoom.jl.player.jlp
public class jlp extends Object
The jlp class implements a simple command-line player for MPEG audio files.
Author:
Mat McGowan (mdm@techie.com)
